availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas B. Hunt (Trimble County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, physician, farmer, and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy E. Sadler Hunt in Oldham County on January 17, 1854. Married to Mary H. Affleck Hunt in Trimble County in September 1862. Father of Mollie G. Hunt. Physician in Oldham County, Kentucky in 1860. Farmer in Trimble County, Kentucky in 1863. Served in the 54th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as assistant surgeon from October 1, 1864 to September 1, 1865.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trimble County Marriages, Film #000420401, p. 203
